features.name: Firebase Authentication System
features.description: Complete Google OAuth authentication with Firebase integration, user management, and token-based authorization

features.name: Task Management System
features.description: Full CRUD operations for blockchain-based freelance tasks with categories, budgets, deadlines, and skill requirements

features.name: Partial Approval System
features.description: Revolutionary system allowing clients to approve individual files instead of entire submissions, with proportional payment calculation

features.name: Zero-Knowledge Proof (ZKP) Validation
features.description: Cryptographic ZKP system using Pedersen Commitments and Schnorr proofs for file validation without revealing content

features.name: File Submission and Management
features.description: Multi-file upload system with individual file status tracking, approval workflow, and secure download functionality

features.name: Blockchain Integration
features.description: Ethereum wallet connection, smart contract interaction, and escrow payment system with MetaMask integration

features.name: Payment Claim System
features.description: Proportional payment claims based on approved files with blockchain escrow integration and ETH transactions

features.name: User Role Management
features.description: Dynamic user type switching between client and freelancer roles with role-specific UI and permissions

features.name: Real-time Status Updates
features.description: Live updates for submission status, file approvals, and payment claims with auto-refresh functionality

features.name: Advanced UI Components
features.description: Modern React UI with Radix components, TailwindCSS styling, responsive design, and accessibility features

features.name: Navigation and Routing
features.description: Multi-page application with protected routes, mobile-responsive navigation, and user-specific menu items

features.name: Loading and Error Handling
features.description: Comprehensive loading states, error boundaries, and user feedback systems throughout the application

features.name: Welcome and Onboarding
features.description: User onboarding experience with celebration animations and welcome messages for new users
